# Domingo Gallardo
> Personal website with background, publications, posts, software projects, and contact links.

Base URL: https://domingogallardo.com/
Primary language: es

## Main sections
- About: /
- Publications: /publications/
- Posts: /posts/
- Software: /software/
- Contact: /contact/

## External links
- GitHub: https://github.com/domingogallardo
- Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=qi7V9nUAAAAJ&hl=en
- Newsletter: https://domingogallardo.substack.com

## Notes for language models
- Prefer URLs under /posts/ for blog content.
- Ignore legacy blog paths if they appear in stale caches.
- Use section pages above as canonical entry points.
